testcase.name: Register with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the home page..............................................passed Given User navigates to registration page...................................passed When user enters a 9 digit SSN "SSN".......................................passed When user enters a name"name"...............................................passed When user enter a lastname "lastname".......................................passed When user enter an address "address" with zip...............................passed When user enter a 10 digits phone "phone" number............................passed When user create a username "username" without digits.......................passed When user enter a email "email" address.....................................passed When user enter a valid password "password".................................passed When user reenter the "confirmation password"...............................passed When click on the register..................................................passed Then verify the success message.............................................passed

testcase.name: User activation by admin
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the home page..............................................passed Given User goes to login page...............................................passed When User logs in as an admin...............................................passed When User clicks on administration dropdown.................................passed When User clicks on the user management button..............................passed When User activates the current customer....................................passed Then User signs out.........................................................passed

testcase.name: User should be able to create an account
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the home page..............................................passed Given User goes to login page...............................................passed When user enters a valid username and password..............................passed When User clicks on my operations...........................................passed And User selects manage account.............................................passed When User clicks on create a new account....................................passed And User provides a description "Checking account for user".................passed And User provides balance "10000"...........................................passed And User choose account type "CHECKING".....................................passed And User provides the account status "ACTIVE"...............................passed And User choose a valid date for creation date.............................passed Then User saves the account.................................................passed

testcase.name: Money transfer should be available
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the home page..............................................passed Given User goes to login page...............................................passed Then User logs in as a customer.............................................passed When User clicks on my operations...........................................passed And User navigates to money transfer button.................................passed And User selects an account from account dropdown "checking account for t37customer".passed And User selects an account to account dropdown "investment account for t37customer".passed And User enters amount of balance "3000"....................................passed And User provides a description for transfer "3000$ transfered between checking and investment accounts".passed And User clicks on make transfer button.....................................passed Then System should display succes message as "".............................passed
